mapper.insert: insert into base_natiom (nationNum, value, tabTime, uploadTime) values (#{nationnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tabtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into base_natiom
nationNum,
value,
tabTime,
uploadTime,
#{nationnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tabtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{uploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update base_natiom
value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tabTime = #{tabtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
uploadTime = #{uploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where nationNum = #{nationnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM base_user u LEFT JOIN base_natiom n ON u.nation=n.nationNum LEFT JOIN base_department d ON u.depID=d.id WHERE u.status=1 AND u.depID=#{depId}
